metadata.preview:
{
  "name": "critique",
  "module": "src/diff.tsx",
  "type": "module",
  "version": "0.1.14",
  "private": false,
  "bin": "./src/cli.tsx",
  "scripts": {
    "cli": "bun src/cli.tsx",
    "cli:watch": "bun --watch src/cli.tsx",
    "prepublishonly": "tsc",
    "example": "bun --watch src/example.tsx",
    "worker:dev": "wrangler dev",
    "worker:deploy": "wrangler deploy"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@cloudflare/workers-types": "^4.20250525.0",
    "@types/bun": "1.3.5",
    "@types/js-yaml": "^4.0.9",
    "hono": "^4.7.10",
